resources.string: Audio Jack reader already connected. Please proceed further
Payment using both Audio Jack and EMV Reader
%1$s requires an update to the Android Wear app.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update the Android Wear app.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.

string.name: email_receipt_privacy_message
string.note: PayPal privacy policy message for email receipt

resources.string: By entering my email, I agree to receive emails for all future PayPal Here transactions.
Please connect to EMV Reader before proceeding to take payment
EMV Reader already connected. Please proceed further
Software on currently connected EMV Reader needs to be updated before taking payment
Failed to set AccessToken. Please try after clearing the data/cache of the application.
Entered amount is invalid. Please enter the valid amount
Invalid login information. Please try again.
Login failed. Go to www.paypal.com to resolve this issue.
Audio Jack Reader is connected and EMV Reader is not connected. If you want to connect EMV reader please click on below button to connect
Both Audio Jack and EMV Reader is connected.
EMV reader is connected and Audio Jack reader is not connected. If you want to connect Audio Jack reader please plug it in

Looks like there is no reader connected. Please connect at least one reader before proceeding further.\n For Audio Jack reader please plug it in. \nIn case EMV reader please use the below button to connect to it.

A new software update is available for connected Card Reader. This is required to accept card payments. Please connect your mobile device via Wi-Fi and plug the reader to power source before you begin.
A new optional software update is available. The install time will vary depending on network speed and you will be unable to process transactions through out the update process.
Please enter a valid email address
Your card has not been charged.\nWould you like a receipt?
Would you like to cancel this transaction?
Please tap Done to complete this purchase. (If you need to change your order, you can ask for a refund.)
I agree to pay the above amount according to the card issuer agreement.
Please do not close the app or turn off the reader during the update process. Doing so may require a hard reset of your reader.
Do not quit the app or press any keys on the card reader until the update is complete.
Sorry, the update could not be completed.
Battery level on connected reader is critically low. Please charge the reader and try again.

A new software update is available for the connected card reader. This is required to accept card payments. Please connect your mobile device via Wi-Fi and plug the reader to power source before you begin
You can now accept card payments.
Waiting for customer input on terminal

string.name: sdk_back_dated_invoice
string.note: Error message for when a user's phone is set to a date-time in the past - a situation that causes an invoicing API error

resources.string: This order cannot be processed because your phone\'s date and time appear to be inaccurate. Please correct your phone\'s time and date settings, then process your order.
There was a problem reading the card information. Please try again.
Card reader is disabled, please call customer care on %1$s.
For consumer and merchant security, this application requires you to disclose your location.\n\nPlease enable location services in your device\’s settings.
Card issuer requires that you insert the card.
The maximum amount for card payments is %1$s. Please enter a new amount or choose a different payment method.
The minimum amount for card payments is %1$s. Please enter a new amount or choose a different payment method.
Sorry, the card has been blocked. Please remove your card and contact the card issuer to advise.
Swipe the card at the top of the reader.
The PIN is incorrect. Please try again.
If the PIN is entered incorrectly again, the card will be blocked. Try again or remove the card to cancel the transaction.
Please try again. Firmly insert the card, chip first, into the bottom of the card reader.
The transaction cannot complete successfully. Please advise the customer to use an alternative payment method.
Please remove the card and contact the card issuer for more information.
Please remove card and contact issuer
There was a problem reading the card. Please try swiping the card.
Please insert or swipe your card
Please insert or swipe your card now, or try a different card.
Card reader is disabled, please call customer service
Do you want to try again by inserting the card?

You must recharge your card reader before you can continue to process card payments.

Remove the card to continue.
No PayPal device paired.\n\nPlease go to Settings->Bluetooth to pair with a PayPal EMV device
System error. Please try again later
Card does not match card used for transaction. Please remove card.
Error while processing refund. Please try again later.
To process this refund, please use the same card used for the original payment.
Downloading of the current file completed…
It\'s highly recommended to update the software on EMV device. \n\nWith out this you can still take the payments. But it is highly recommended to update
Software on the EMV device needs to be updated.\n\nWith out this device can\'t be used for taking the payments.
Please enter the PIN on the card reader keypad.
Please tap, insert, or swipe your card
Please connect a card reader to process this payment
Please connect a card reader to process this refund
The transaction could not be completed successfully. Please try an alternate payment method.
System error. Please try again later.
An invoice already exists for the merchant with this invoice number: %1$s.
The merchant\'s account access is limited
We\'re sorry, this transaction could not be completed. Please try again or cancel this order.
You do not appear to be connected to the Internet. You must be connected in order to use PayPal Here.
You do not appear to be connected to the Internet. You must be connected in order to use PayPal Here.
We\'re sorry, this transaction could not be completed. Please try again or cancel this order.

Card not recognized.
Please try a
different payment
method.
Unable to read card\nInsert or swipe card
Unable to read card\nInsert or swipe card\nor try another card
Card issuer requires\nthat you insert\nthe card.
Do you want to retry\nby inserting or\nswiping the card?
We\'re sorry, No network available to complete the transaction. Please try again or cancel this order.
This credit card is not currently supported by PayPal Here. Please use another type of card.

string.name: send_receipt_privacy_message
string.note: PayPal privacy policy message for receipt options

resources.string: Receipts will be delivered by PayPal. See your receipt for PayPal\'s Privacy Policy.
The number must include the country code.

string.name: sms_receipt_privacy_message
string.note: PayPal privacy policy message for sms receipt

resources.string: You agree that you\'re authorized to add this phone number and consent to receiving automated texts. Message and data rates may apply. Receipts will be delivered by PayPal. See your receipt for PayPal\'s Privacy Policy.
